org.trianacode.taskgraph.interceptor

Interface Interceptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExecutionInterceptor

    public interface Interceptor
    Interceptors are given a crack at looking at data before sending from a node, and before receiving. They get called at the cable level.

    Interceptors are triggered based on parameters
